articles.title: Death toll in Lisbon streetcar crash rises to 17 as Portugal observes national day of mourning
articles.description: The death toll in the crash of a famous Lisbon streetcar popular with tourists has risen to 17 after two of the 23 injured people died from their injuries while in hospital care [2, 4, 5].

articles.title: 300,000 more people evacuated in eastern Pakistan after a new Indian flood alert
articles.description: Due to severe floods, 300,000 more individuals have been evacuated in eastern Pakistan following a recent flood alert from India [1, 2].

articles.title: Centre launches subsidised onion sale at ₹24/kg in Delhi, Mumbai, Ahmedabad
articles.description: The Indian government has launched a subsidized onion sale at ₹24/kg in Delhi, Mumbai, and Ahmedabad [1].
